Title: Support highlighting the first line of file
Author: bomsy
Description:
Associated Issue: none

### Summary of Changes

* As a follow-up to #4143
* Fixes an issue where the `line` being `0` returns a falsy, causing the not to highlight for single line minifed files
* Use `loadedState` to check if the text has fully loaded

### Test Plan

Tell us a little a bit about how you tested your patch.

Example test plan:

- [x] Go to the `source mapped js.min files` example
- [x] Press `cmd + shift + f`
- [x] search for `log-message`
- [x] Click the match result for `example-websites/source-mapping/js/main.min.js`
- [x] The line should flash

Title: Upgrade flow
Author: ahuth
Description:
Associated Issue: #3683 

### Summary of Changes

* Updated Flow to 0.53.0.
* Moved `defaultProps` for class components to `static` properties, which Flow understands.
* Updated the syntax of the flow typing. Note that I have not tried to improve on any of the type signatures at all.

In particular, instead of defining classes like

```js
class Foo extends Component {
  props: Props
  state: State
}
```

it will now be

```js
class Foo extends Component<Props, State>
```

### Test Plan

* Tests
* Manual QA
Label: Code Health
label: Code Health
